heading: Javascript
title: What is it?
text: JavaScript is a scripting language. It makes your web pages more dynamic. What does that mean? I'm dynamic and I'm not a webpage. Well JavaScript helps the page handle events (clicking the submit button), do math (you can add/subract/multiply and divide) and you can store information for use later (variables).
